issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Same in 1.5.1, device specific - found in 1.6.0 (01/03/11 08:14 11dd2b6), droid 1 (2.2.1)

1.Phone>geolocation

results: runtime error
location: 342,0 app://examples/geolocation.js
message: wrapped java.lang.IllegalArgumentsException: Expected 2 arguments for log, got 1 (app://examples/geolocation.js#342)

not seen on nexus 1, g1 or g2

{html}
fields.summary: Android: geo location droid 1 only - runtime error invoked on geolocation test

comments.body: This version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
